programme.title: Honeymoon From Hell
programme.desc: Horror. On her honeymoon, a woman learns a girl who died of a broken heart haunts the bed and breakfast that she and her husband are staying in. When a hurricane strands them at the house, she learns the legends about the ghost are all too real

programme.title: Nerve
programme.desc: Thriller with Emma Roberts. Vee Delmonico, a high school senior is pressured into joining the popular online game of truth or dare. She soon finds herself caught up in the competition which requires her to perform stunts that ultimately will determine her entire future

programme.title: Cyber Case
programme.desc: Thriller. A young woman uses geotagged pictures to help rescue her kidnapped brother

programme.title: Renegades
programme.desc: Action with J.K. Simmons. In the war-torn Bosnian capital of Sarajevo, US Navy Seal Matt Barnes leads a band of renegades on a covert operation to rescue treasure from the bottom of a lake

programme.title: Beyond The Edge
programme.desc: Action and adventure starring Lyubov Aksyonova and Antonio Banderas. Contemporary Moscow. A talented gambler gathers a team of people with supernatural powers to win big at a casino. But they find a much stronger mystical rival

programme.title: Enter The Warrior's Gate
programme.desc: Epic fantasy-adventure meets martial arts action. A teenage gamer is transported to a fantasy world, where he is mistaken for his video-game alter ego, a legendary hero. Soon, he sets out to rescue a kidnapped princess from the clutches of a cruel warlord

programme.title: Resident Evil: Vendetta
programme.desc: Animation. BSAA Chris Redfield enlists the help of government agent Leon S. Kennedy and Professor Rebecca Chambers from Alexander Institute of Biotechnology to stop a death merchant with a vengeance from spreading a deadly virus in New York

programme.title: Beast Of Burden
programme.desc: Action and crime. Sean Haggerty only has an hour to deliver his illegal cargo. An hour to reassure a drug cartel, a hitman, and the DEA that nothing is wrong. An hour to make sure his wife survives. And he must do it all from the cockpit of his Cessna

programme.title: Patient Zero
programme.desc: Horror and action. After an unprecedented global pandemic turns the majority of humankind into violent "Infected," a man gifted with the ability to speak the Infected's new language leads the last survivors on a hunt for Patient Zero and a cure

programme.title: Body Of Sin
programme.desc: Adventure. When two women who use seduction to steal from men discover that one of their victims is hiding millions in diamonds, the score of their lives becomes a run for their lives

programme.title: Double Trouble

programme.title: Against The Ropes
programme.desc: Based on the real-life story of Jackie Kallen (Meg Ryan), a Jewish woman from Detroit who became a successful boxing manager by believing in the fighting skills of Luther Shaw (Omar Epps)

programme.title: The Hollow Point
programme.desc: Thriller with Patrick Wilson and Lynn Collins. A retired lawman works with a new sheriff when a botched Mexican drug deal and a vicious hit man threaten their border town

programme.title: Chokehold
programme.desc: Action. Story of a woman who seeks revenge on the Russian Mob for the death of her father. She battles her way up in the underground mixed martial arts fighting world to find those responsible and avenge his death

programme.title: Reign Of Fire
programme.desc: Fantasy action with Christian Bale and Matthew McConaughey. A brood of fire-breathing dragons emerges from the earth wreaking havoc across the globe, torching civilization and turning humans into an endangered species

programme.desc: Thriller starring Andy Garcia and Lance Henriksen. A big city cop from LA moves to a small town police force and immediately finds himself investigating a murder

programme.title: Sometimes The Good Kill

programme.title: Mine
programme.desc: Thriller with Armie Hammer. After a failed assassination attempt, a soldier finds himself stranded in the desert. Exposed to the elements, he must survive the dangers of the desert and battle the psychological and physical toll of the treacherous conditions

programme.title: Doom
programme.desc: Sci-fi action with Karl Urban, Dwayne Johnson. An experiment on Mars has opened a portal to a variety of demonic creatures that have overtaken the Olduvai research colony. Now military personnel must close off any access to Earth and exterminate the satanic beasts

programme.title: Pitch Black
programme.desc: Sci-fi horror. A spaceship transporting a disparate group of people crash-lands on an abandoned planet. Prisoner Richard B. Riddick (Vin Diesel) escapes but returns to join forces with other survivors when vicious and bloodthirsty mutants surface from underground

programme.title: Repo Men
programme.desc: In a futuristic world where artificial organs can extend lives, a man finds himself on the run when he can't make the payments for his new heart

programme.title: What About Bob?
programme.desc: A successful psychiatrist loses his mind after one of his most dependent patients tracks him down during his family vacation. Comedy starring Bill Murray and Richard Dreyfuss

programme.title: The Water Horse: Legend Of The Deep
programme.desc: A lonely boy discovers a mysterious egg that hatches a sea creature of Scottish legend. Family adventure starring Bruce Allpress and Geraldine Brophy

programme.title: Jason Bourne
programme.desc: Action thriller, Matt Damon, Tommy Lee Jones, Alicia Vikander. The former CIA assassin resurfaces, teaming up with a former operative to uncover the truth behind his father's death while simultaneously exacting revenge and evading the government forces hot on his trail

programme.title: Labor Day
programme.desc: Drama. An escaped convict (Josh Brolin) manipulates an emotionally single mother (Kate Winslet) into letting him hide out at her house. As police search the town for the escapee, mother and son gradually learn his true story as their options become increasingly limited

programme.title: Dare To Be Wild
programme.desc: Drama. Irishwoman Mary Reynold's journey from rank outsider to winner of a Gold Medal at the Chelsea Flower Show

programme.title: Monsters vs. Aliens
programme.desc: Animation. Hit by a meteorite from outer space and turned into a giant monster, a young woman is taken to a secret government compound where she meets a ragtag group of monsters rounded up over the years

programme.title: The Producers
programme.desc: After putting together another Broadway flop, down-on-his-luck producer Max Bialystock teams up with timid accountant Leo Bloom in a get-rich-quick scheme to put on the world's worst show. Comedy with Nathan Lane

programme.title: The Great Wall
programme.desc: Action-fantasy epic set in 11th century China, where mercenary warrior (Matt Damon) is captured and then imprisoned within the Great Wall. As a horde of marauding beasts besiege the massive structure, his quest for fortune turns into a journey toward heroism

programme.title: Being John Malkovich
programme.desc: Off-beat comedy with John Cussack, Cameron Diaz and John Malkovich. A puppeteer discovers a door in his office that allows him to enter the mind of John Malkovich. The puppeteer then tries to turn the portal into a small business, offering trips insode the actors' head

programme.title: Vanilla Sky
programme.desc: Complex thriller starring Tom Cruise and Penelope Cruz. Following a car accident a successful publisher finds his life turning surreal

programme.title: Vanilla Sky
programme.desc: Complex thriller starring Tom Cruise and Penelope Cruz. Following a car accident a successful publisher finds his life turning surreal

programme.title: Out Of Sight
programme.desc: Crime caper. A bank robber and a US Marshall (George Clooney, Jennifer Lopez) are forced to share a car trunk during a prison escape. A romantic interlude ensues but the question of whether she is pursuing him for love or to arrest him ends in a showdown at a robbery

programme.title: Of Mice And Men
programme.desc: Drama. Moving adaptation of John Steinbeck's classic novel following two migrant workers, one a dim-witted gentle giant (John Malkovich) and the other his judicious protector (Gary Sinise), who find job as farmhands in Depression-era California

programme.title: Romancing The Stone
programme.desc: Action adventure Kathleen Turner, Michael Douglas and Danny DeVito. A novelist, aided by a soldier of fortune, gets caught up in a real life South American adventure when forced to find a mysterious treasure in order to rescue her kidnapped sister

programme.title: My Bakery In Brooklyn
programme.desc: Comedy. Two cousins find themselves with a challenging inheritance. When the bank reveals their late aunt's Boulangerie is in danger of foreclosure, Vivien (Aimee Teegarden) and Chloe (Krysta Rodriguez) must put the baking mitts down to preserve their family's legacy

programme.title: Edward Scissorhands
programme.desc: Comedy drama with Johhny Depp and Winona Rider. An uncommonly gentle young man, who happens to have scissors for hands, falls in love with a beautiful teenage girl

programme.title: Now You See Me 2
programme.desc: Action adventure with an all-star cast including Morgan Freeman and Woody Harrelson. A year after outwitting the FBI and winning the public’s adulation with their mind-bending spectacles, the Four Horsemen resurface to find themselves face to face with a new enemy

programme.title: Idiocracy
programme.desc: Comedy. Pvt. Bauers (Luke Wilson), the definition of "average Joe

programme.title: Inglourious Basterds
programme.desc: Oscar winning WWII action starring Brad Pitt. In Nazi-occupied France a group of American soldiers known as "The Basterds" are chosen specifically to spread fear throughout the Third Reich by brutally killing Nazis

programme.title: Inglourious Basterds
programme.desc: Oscar winning WWII action starring Brad Pitt. In Nazi-occupied France a group of American soldiers known as "The Basterds" are chosen specifically to spread fear throughout the Third Reich by brutally killing Nazis

programme.title: Blue Sky
programme.desc: Drama, Jessica Lange, Tommy Lee Jones. A nuclear engineer causes waves with his superiors due to his stance against the atmospheric testing of nuclear weapons, while his wife further aggravates the situation because of her emotional instability and flirtatious nature

programme.title: Murder Of A Cat
programme.desc: Comedy. When someone murders his beloved cat, Clinton demands justice. Taking it upon himself to solve the case, he teams up with an unlikely ally, Greta, and the two set out to find the culprit lurking in their small suburban town

programme.title: My Bakery In Brooklyn
programme.desc: Comedy. Two cousins find themselves with a challenging inheritance. When the bank reveals their late aunt's Boulangerie is in danger of foreclosure, Vivien (Aimee Teegarden) and Chloe (Krysta Rodriguez) must put the baking mitts down to preserve their family's legacy

programme.title: Edward Scissorhands

programme.title: Hardflip
programme.desc: Action. After his mother falls ill, a troubled young skateboarder (Randy Wayne) sets out to find the father (John Schneider) he never really knew

programme.title: JL Ranch
programme.desc: Drama. Veteran rancher John Landsburg (Jon Voight) faces federal bureaucracy when his old enemy, Tap Peterson (James Caan), falsifies documents and alleges that Landsburg doesn't own his family ranch

programme.title: Dalida
programme.desc: Biographical drama based on the true story of Cairo-born acclaimed musical icon "Dalida

programme.title: Nim's Island
programme.desc: Adventure with Abigail Breslin, Gerard Butler and Jodie Foster. A courageous young girl inhabits an exotic island with her father. When he disappears, she turns to the only person who can help her, adventurer Alex Rover, the reclusive author of the novel she's reading

programme.title: Cinderella Man
programme.desc: Biopic starring Russell Crowe, Renee Zellweger, Paul Giamatti. The story of James Braddock, a washed-up boxer who's surprise 1930s comeback inspired a nation desperate for good news....and all eyes were on Braddock when in 1935 he took on heavyweight champion Max Baer

programme.title: Revolutionary Road
programme.desc: Drama starring Kate Winslet and Leonardo DiCaprio based on the novel by Richard Yates. A young couple living in a Connecticut suburb in the 1950's struggle to come to terms with their personal problems

programme.title: Lock, Stock And Two Smoking Barrels
programme.desc: Classic heist film with Jason Flemyng, Dexter Fletcher, Nick Moran and Jason Statham. Four working class stiffs pool their money in a high stakes card game but end up owing half a million with one week to find the cash

programme.title: Lock, Stock And Two Smoking Barrels
programme.desc: Classic heist film with Jason Flemyng, Dexter Fletcher, Nick Moran and Jason Statham. Four working class stiffs pool their money in a high stakes card game but end up owing half a million with one week to find the cash

programme.title: Dude, Where's My Car?
programme.desc: Comedy. Two dudes (Ashton Kutcher, Seann William Scott) set out to find their wheels and discover they had a more eventful evening than imagined as strippers, aliens, a suitcase full of money, and a kitchen full of pudding become pieces in the puzzle of the missing car

programme.title: Hot Rod
programme.desc: Comedy. When his abusive stepfather falls ill, an inept would-be stuntman, who thinks his dad worked for daredevil Evel Knievel, gets the idea to attempt a dangerous stunt & raise money for a cure... his master plan being he'll still get the chance to exact his revenge

programme.desc: Family comedy. Everyone's favourite peewee hockey team are thrilled to be chosen to compete in the Junior Goodwill Games as Team USA. They'll be facing off against the best teams from all over the world including the meanest team that ever sliced up the ice!

programme.title: Bambi
programme.desc: This classic Disney animated feature follows the male deer Bambi from birth, through his early childhood experiences with woodland pals, to the mature antlered Bambi assuming his place as the Prince of the Forest

programme.title: Pocahontas II: Journey To A New World
programme.desc: Join beautiful Native American Princess Pocahontas and her animal friends Meeko, Flit and Percy as they embark on the adventure of a lifetime. In this sequel to the first hit movie Disney's Pocahontas, our heroine decides to journey to London

programme.title: A Wrinkle In Time
programme.desc: Family and Adventure starring Gugu Mbatha-Raw and Chris Pine. After the disappearance of her scientist father, three peculiar beings send Meg, her brother, and her friend to space in order to find him

programme.title: Ice Princess
programme.desc: Family comedy starring Joan Cusack and Kim Cattrall. With the help of her coach, her parents, and the boy who drives the Zamboni machine, geeky high school misfit Casey is determined to realise her dream of becoming a champion figure skater

programme.title: Held Up
programme.desc: Comedy. A man (Jamie Foxx) finds his day going from bad to worse after he's dumped by his girl, stranded at a convenience store when a kid cons him out of his car keys and caught up in the middle of a botched robbery

programme.title: Imagine That
programme.desc: Comedy with Eddie Murphy and Thomas Haden Church. A financial executive who can't stop his career down spiralling is invited into his daughter's imaginary world where solutions to his problems await

programme.title: Honeymooners
programme.desc: Comedy about a New York City bus driver Ralph and his feisty wife Alice, who struggle to make ends meet. They've managed to save some money along with friends for a down payment on a Brooklyn duplex

programme.title: A Royal Christmas
programme.desc: Romance. A young working girl with a blue-collar background is surprised when her new fiance announces he is actually a prince of a small sovereign country in Europe

programme.title: Father Of The Bride
programme.desc: Family comedy starring Steve Martin, Diane Keaton and Martin Short, chronicling a father's hysterical trials and tribulations leading up to his daughter's big event whilst being at the mercy of an off-the-wall wedding coordinator

programme.title: Father Of The Bride Part II
programme.desc: Comedy with Steve Martin, Diane Keaton, Martin Short. A worrisome family patriarch is driven to distraction by the simultaneous pregnancies of his wife and daughter, and the return of the oddly accented wedding designer who has moved into baby showers and home decor

programme.title: Deuce Bigalow: Male Gigolo
programme.desc: Comedy. Deuce Bigalow is an aquarium cleaner until he gets a temporary job babysitting a gigolo's precious fish but when he accidentally wrecks the house he's forced to compensate by becoming a gigolo himself

programme.title: Another 48 Hours
programme.desc: Upon his release from prison, Reggie Hammond is coerced by Jack Cates into helping him track down an elusive, and deadly, drug lord. Comedy starring Eddie Murphy and Nick Nolte

programme.desc: Upon his release from prison, Reggie Hammond is coerced by Jack Cates into helping him track down an elusive, and deadly, drug lord. Comedy starring Eddie Murphy and Nick Nolte

programme.title: Bull Durham
programme.desc: Comedy drama starring Kevin Costner and Susan Sarandon. A fan who has an affair with one minor-league baseball player each season meets an up-and-coming pitcher and the experienced catcher assigned to him

programme.title: Napoleon Dynamite
programme.desc: Comedy, Jon Heder, Jon Gries, Efren Ramirez. A carrot-topped oddball with a decidedly eccentric family that includes his llama-loving, dune-buggy enthusiast grandmother, uses some non-traditional means to help his pal run a winning campaign and defeat the popular girl

programme.title: Kung Fu Yoga
programme.desc: Action Comedy starring Jackie Chan and Disha Patani. Two professors team up to locate a lost treasure and embark on an adventure that takes them from a Tibetan ice cave to Dubai to a mountain temple in India

programme.title: Ghost Team
programme.desc: Comedy starring Justin Long and Jon Heder. A paranormal-obsessed man mounts his own investigation into the beyond with his depressed best friend, misfit nephew, a cable access medium and an overeager security guard

programme.title: Dead 7
programme.desc: In this campy, gory twist on the post-apocalyptic genre, a team of cowboys (Joey Fatone, A.J. McLean, Jeff Timmons, Delious Kennedy and other former members of '90s boy bands) battle a zombie invasion. Written, directed by and starring former Backstreet Boy Nick Carter

programme.title: Sharknado 4 : The 4th Awakens
programme.desc: This disaster comedy sci-fi horror flick follows Fin (Ian Ziering), whose family and the cosmos have been blissfully sharknado-free in the five years since the most recent attack, but now sharks and tornados are being whipped up in unexpected ways and places

programme.title: Sharknado 4 : The 4th Awakens
programme.desc: This disaster comedy sci-fi horror flick follows Fin (Ian Ziering), whose family and the cosmos have been blissfully sharknado-free in the five years since the most recent attack, but now sharks and tornados are being whipped up in unexpected ways and places

programme.title: Johnny Be Good
programme.desc: Comedy. It's recruiting time and despite being short and scrawny, Johnny Walker is America's hottest young football prospect. His dilemma: should he take one of the many offers from college talent scouts or should he attend the local state college with his girlfriend?

programme.title: Almost Christmas
programme.desc: Comedy drama, Danny Glover, Kimberly Elise. Walter asks his family to join him for their first Christmas since his wife passed away. If his bickering children and the rest of the family can spend 5 days together under the same roof, it will truly be a Christmas miracle

programme.title: Middle School: The Worst Years Of My Life
programme.desc: Comedy with Griffin Gluck. Teenage artist Rafe Katchadorian has a wild imagination and is sick of middle school and the rules that have been put before him. Rafe and his best friend come up with a plan: break every rule in the school hand book and see what happens

programme.title: Big Daddy
programme.desc: Comedy. Sonny (Adam Sandler) has spent his whole life avoiding responsibility but when his girlfriend dumps him for an older man, he's got to find a way to prove he's ready to grow up. In a desperate last-ditch effort, Sonny adopts a 5-year-old kid to impress her

programme.title: Love At Large
programme.desc: Romantic thriller starring Tom Berenger and Elizabeth Perkins. Harry Dobbs, an inept private investigator, meets a new client who wants him to follow her abusive lover. He accepts the case but soon realises that he himself is also being followed

programme.title: Some Freaks
programme.desc: Comedy and drama starring Marin Ireland and Thomas Mann. A charming romance develops between a boy with one eye and an overweight girl, though when she loses weight after going to college, their relationship is tested in devastating ways they never dreamed would happen

programme.title: Crash Pad
programme.desc: Drama with Christina Applegate. A hopeless romantic, who thinks he's found true love with an older woman, learns that she's married and that the fling is merely an instrument of revenge against her neglectful husband

programme.title: Christmas In The Smokies
programme.desc: Drama. A young woman battling to save her family's Smoky Mountain berry farm decides to organise a Christmas concert, calling in a favour from her country music star ex-boyfriend

programme.title: Confessions Of A Shopaholic
programme.desc: Romantic comedy starring Isla Fisher. A college graduate lands a job as a financial journalist in New York City where she nurtures her addiction to shopping and falls for a wealthy entrepreneur

programme.title: Home Again
programme.desc: Romantic comedy. Recently separated from her husband, Alice Kinney (Reese Witherspoon) moves back home to Los Angeles. As Alice develops a romance with a much younger filmmaker, her newfound happiness comes crashing down when her ex-husband (Michael Sheen) shows up

programme.title: Kingpin
programme.desc: Comedy with Woody Harrelson, Randy Quaid and Bill Murray. A star bowler whose career was prematurely cut off hopes to ride a new prodigy to success and riches

programme.title: Overlord
programme.desc: Thriller. On the eve of D-Day, a team of American paratroopers drop into Nazi-occupied France to penetrate the walls of a fortified church. In a mysterious lab beneath the church, the outnumbered G.I's come face-to-face with enemies unlike any the world has ever seen

programme.desc: Comedy. Will Ferrell, Mark Wahlberg. Dusty and Brad join forces to make Christmastime perfect for the children. Their newfound partnership soon gets put to the test when their intrusive fathers arrive to turn the holiday upside down. Mel Gibson, John Lithgow also star

programme.title: Show Dogs
programme.desc: Adventure and comedy. Max, a macho, solitary Rottweiler police dog is ordered to go undercover as a primped show dog in a prestigious Dog Show, along with his human partner, to avert a disaster from happening

programme.title: Goodbye Christopher Robin
programme.desc: Biographical drama. After leaving London for the English countryside, writer A.A. Milne starts to spin fanciful yarns about his son's growing collection of stuffed animals. These stories form the basis for "Winnie-the-Pooh" published in 1926

programme.title: I Can Only Imagine
programme.desc: Biographical drama with Dennis Quaid. Growing up in Texas, Bart Millard suffers physical and emotional abuse at the hands of his father. His tough upbringing inspires him to write the hit song "I Can Only Imagine" as singer of the band MercyMe

programme.title: Flower Shop Mystery: Dearly Depotted
programme.desc: Crime drama. Abby Knight, ex-lawyer, crime buff and owner of Bloomers Flower Shop, is having a week to be reckoned with. A reluctant bridesmaid at a wedding, Abby ends up not just doing the flowers, but having to find out who murdered a wedding crasher

programme.desc: Animation and Comedy. Gene, a multi-expressional emoji, sets out on a journey to become a normal emoji

programme.desc: Comedy with Zach Galafinakis and Owen Wilson. A night guard at an armored car company in the Southern U.S. organizes one of the biggest bank heists in American history

programme.desc: Rey develops her newly discovered abilities with the guidance of Luke Skywalker, who is unsettled by the strength of her powers. Meanwhile, the Resistance prepares to do battle with the First Order

programme.desc: Kids animation. Tad Jones, the most awkward explorer, must rescue his beloved Sara from a millionaire who is looking for King Midas' necklace

programme.title: The Miracle Season
programme.desc: Drama starring Erin Moriarty and William Hurt. After the tragic death of star volleyball player Caroline "Line" Found, a team of dispirited high school girls must band together under the guidance of their tough-love coach in hopes of winning the state championship

programme.title: That Good Night
programme.desc: Drama. Ralph, a once-famous screenwriter, is in his seventies and terminally ill tries to reconcile with his son. When the man he hires to painlessly end his life double crosses him, he is given a second chance to right his wrongs before he passes

programme.title: American Animals
programme.desc: Crime and drama starring Evan Peters and Ann Dowd. Four young men mistake their lives for a movie and attempt one of the most audacious heists in U.S. history

programme.title: The Spy Who Dumped Me
programme.desc: Action and comedy starring Justin Theroux and Blanka Gyorfi-Toth. Audrey and Morgan are best friends who unwittingly become entangled in an international conspiracy when one of the women discovers the boyfriend who dumped her was actually a spy

programme.title: Detroit
programme.desc: Crime drama starring John Boyega, Anthony Mackie and Algee Smith. A police raid in Detroit in 1967 results in one of the largest citizens' uprisings in the history of the United States

programme.title: Every Day
programme.desc: Drama and romance starring Angourie Rice and Justice Smith. A shy teenager falls for someone who transforms into another person every day

programme.title: The Untold Story
programme.desc: Comedy drama. Edward Forester's career and personal life have hit rock bottom, but not his spirit. At 64, the handsome bachelor moves in to a tiny apartment and must start over again

programme.title: Same Kind Of Different As Me

programme.title: The Outcasts
programme.desc: Comedy and Drama. After falling victim to a humiliating prank by the high school Queen Bee, best friends and world-class geeks, Mindy and Jodi, decide to get their revenge by uniting the outcasts of the school against her and her circle of friends

programme.title: Wonder
programme.desc: Family drama starring Julia Roberts and Owen Wilson. The story of August Pullman – a boy with facial differences – who enters fifth grade, attending a mainstream elementary school for the first time

programme.desc: Action. Three years after the destruction of the Jurassic World theme park, Owen Grady (Chris Pratt) and Claire Dearing (Bryce Dallas Howard) return to Isla Nublar to save the remaining dinosaurs from a volcano that's about to erupt

programme.title: Insidious: The Last Key
programme.desc: Horror starring Lin Shaye, Leigh Whannell and Angus Sampson. Parapsychologist Elise Rainier and her team investigate a man's claim of a haunting - but terror soon strikes when Rainier realizes that the house the man lives in is her family's old home

programme.title: American Assassin
programme.desc: This action thriller follows the rise of Mitch Rapp (Dylan O'Brien), a CIA black ops recruit under the instruction of Cold War veteran Stan Hurley (Michael Keaton). The pair are then enlisted to investigate a wave of random attacks on military and civilian targets

programme.desc: Kids animation. Tad Jones, the most awkward explorer, must rescue his beloved Sara from a millionaire who is looking for King Midas' necklace

programme.title: The Miracle Season
programme.desc: Drama starring Erin Moriarty and William Hurt. After the tragic death of star volleyball player Caroline "Line" Found, a team of dispirited high school girls must band together under the guidance of their tough-love coach in hopes of winning the state championship

programme.title: Same Kind Of Different As Me
programme.desc: Based on the inspiring true story of international art dealer Ron Hall (Greg Kinnear), who befriends a dangerous homeless man in order to save his struggling marriage to Debbie (Renée Zellweger), a woman whose dreams will lead them all on the journey of their lives

programme.title: The Untold Story
programme.desc: Comedy drama. Edward Forester's career and personal life have hit rock bottom, but not his spirit. At 64, the handsome bachelor moves in to a tiny apartment and must start over again

programme.title: A Boy Called Sailboat
programme.desc: Comedy drama. A Hispanic family find hope in their extraordinary son named Sailboat when a personal gesture awakens a global desire. Armed with a "little guitar

programme.title: After The Reality
programme.desc: Drama and comedy starring Matthew Morrison and Sarah Chalke. The life of a contestant on a 'Bachelorette' style reality show is thrown into turmoil when the sudden death of his father forces him to quit the series prematurely and reconnect with his estranged sister

programme.title: The Outcasts
programme.desc: Comedy and Drama. After falling victim to a humiliating prank by the high school Queen Bee, best friends and world-class geeks, Mindy and Jodi, decide to get their revenge by uniting the outcasts of the school against her and her circle of friends

programme.title: Wonder
programme.desc: Family drama starring Julia Roberts and Owen Wilson. The story of August Pullman – a boy with facial differences – who enters fifth grade, attending a mainstream elementary school for the first time

programme.title: Jurassic World: Fallen Kingdom
programme.desc: Action. Three years after the destruction of the Jurassic World theme park, Owen Grady (Chris Pratt) and Claire Dearing (Bryce Dallas Howard) return to Isla Nublar to save the remaining dinosaurs from a volcano that's about to erupt

programme.title: Insidious: The Last Key
programme.desc: Horror starring Lin Shaye, Leigh Whannell and Angus Sampson. Parapsychologist Elise Rainier and her team investigate a man's claim of a haunting - but terror soon strikes when Rainier realizes that the house the man lives in is her family's old home

programme.title: American Assassin
programme.desc: This action thriller follows the rise of Mitch Rapp (Dylan O'Brien), a CIA black ops recruit under the instruction of Cold War veteran Stan Hurley (Michael Keaton). The pair are then enlisted to investigate a wave of random attacks on military and civilian targets

programme.title: The Black Prince
programme.desc: Drama starring Jason Flemyng and Amanda Root. A story of Queen Victoria and the Last King of Punjab, Maharajah Duleep Singh. His character as it evolves, torn between two cultures and facing constant dilemmas as a result

programme.title: Same Kind Of Different As Me
programme.desc: Based on the inspiring true story of international art dealer Ron Hall (Greg Kinnear), who befriends a dangerous homeless man in order to save his struggling marriage to Debbie (Renée Zellweger), a woman whose dreams will lead them all on the journey of their lives

programme.title: Mary And The Witch's Flower
programme.desc: Animation and adventure. Based on "The Little Broomstick" by Mary Stewart, a strange flower grants a girl magic powers

programme.title: Golden Exits
programme.desc: Drama starring Emily Browning, Mary-Louise Parker and Jason Schwartzman. An intersectional narrative set in Brooklyn, N.Y., of a young foreign girl who upsets the precarious balance that holds two families together

programme.title: Paddington 2
programme.desc: Family comedy. Hugh Bonneville, Ben Winshaw. Paddington, now happily settled with the Brown family and a popular member of the local community, picks up a series of odd jobs to buy the perfect present for his Aunt Lucy's 100th birthday, only for the gift to be stolen

programme.title: Deadly Class
programme.desc: Marcus and Maria, now dating in secret, have to deal with the ramifications of Chico's death

programme.title: Veep

programme.title: Flight Of The Conchords
programme.desc: Jemaine starts dating an Australian, to Bret's dismay and inconvenience

programme.title: Elephant
programme.desc: Crime drama directed by Gus Van Sant. A portrayal of two days in the life of a suburban American high school where two cold and calculated misfit friends, Eric (Eric Deulen) and Alex (Alex Frost), are planning a Columbine-style massacre

programme.title: Dancing In September
programme.desc: Drama, Nicole Ari Parker, Isaiah Washington. What happens when integrity and ambition collide in the volatile world of contemporary network TV? She's an idealistic writer hoping to sell a sitcom. He's an ambitious exec looking for a hit to energize his start-up network

programme.title: In Pursuit Of Honor
programme.desc: Western drama depicting the real-life story of five American Calvary soldiers who took a stand against General Douglas MacArthur and fought his 1930s plan to trade men on horses for tanks. Don Johnson, Craig Sheffer and Gabrielle Anwar star

programme.title: Ferrell Takes The Field
programme.desc: Documentary. On an epic single day, comedy superstar Will Ferrell travels to five different spring-training ballparks in Arizona, playing 10 different positions on 10 different major-league teams - all in a heroic effort to raise smiles, and funds for cancer

programme.title: Falcone
programme.desc: Crime drama, Chazz Palminteri, F. Murray Abraham, Anna Galiena. The setting is 1980s Palermo, Italy. As the grip of corruption tightens like a vice on the city, real-life judge Giovanni Falcone has vowed to bring down the Mafia even if it costs him his life

programme.title: Sugar
programme.desc: Introspective sports drama following the story of Miguel "Sugar" Santos, a Dominican pitcher from San Pedro de Macoris struggling to break into the American big league and pull himself and his family out of poverty. Algenis Perez Soto, Rayniel Rufino, Andre Holland

programme.desc: The adventures of North American mum, Cordon Bleu-trained cook and enthusiastic food lover Sarah Sharratt as she navigates her way through a new life in rural France, experiencing as much of the culture, people and food as she can until she is "uprooted" somewhere new

programme.desc: Gino D'Acampo takes us on a tour of the land of his birth, Italy. As we visit each place he tells us why it is so special to him, shows us the sites and demonstrates different recipes from the area using local produce

programme.desc: You've seen an absolutely beautiful cottage in an idyllic country town - wouldn't it be great to get invited inside? My Retreat takes you inside the iconic and the unique cottages that dot the world's shorelines, riverbanks and mountainsides

programme.desc: Holidaying and studying in France as a teenager, the country was influential in establishing James’ love for food. In each episode, James examines the culinary offerings in each region of France and recreates his own version of the dishes he discovers along the way

programme.desc: Nigella Lawson shows that what and how we cook can make us feel better and more alive. Packed with new recipes and tips designed to make our lives easier

programme.desc: Follow the magical adventures of genie twin sisters Shimmer and Shine and their human best friend Leah, who, when needing help with various dilemmas, is granted three wishes after summoning the genies with a rub of her oil lamp pendant necklace

programme.title: Nella The Princess Knight
programme.desc: Nella is a princess who transforms into a knight! She goes on fantastical adventures with her friends, Sir Garret, Trinket, and Clod, to fight for what's right

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.desc: A team of pups led by the energetic Ryder are always at the ready when it comes to helping out around the bustling town of Adventure Bay. They have all the tools, gadgets and gumption they need to help out their community

programme.title: Max & Ruby

programme.title: Cities Of The Underworld
programme.desc: Around the world today, lies city upon city, each with its unknown history. This series will examine a city's ancient cisterns, tombs, clandestine hideouts, and underground shipwrecks that have been lost for hundreds and hundreds of years.

programme.title: Ancient Impossible
programme.desc: We show the amazing genius of Archimedes, who managed to make water flow uphill, Philon created the first robot, and Ctesibius who experimented with pneumatics. Heron of Alexandria invented the steam engine, automatic doors and vending machines!

programme.title: Evolve
programme.desc: A look at communication as a key tool for survival, from simple bacteria cooperating to take down creatures a million times their size, to mankind's complex systems of interacting

programme.title: The Gambler
programme.desc: A literature professor suffering from a gambling addiction, gets in muddy waters with a group of gangsters

programme.title: Sabotage
programme.desc: John 'Breacher' Wharton (Arnold Schwarzenegger) leads an elite DEA task force that takes on the world's deadliest cartels. When the team successfully executes a high-stakes raid on a cartel safe house, they think their work is done – until, one-by-one, the team members mysteriously start to be eliminated. As the body count rises, everyone is a suspect

programme.title: The Bourne Supremacy
programme.desc: Jason Bourne, a former CIA assassin suffering from psychogenic amnesia, wants to learn more of his past as he is once more enveloped in a conspiracy involving the CIA and Operation Treadstone and forced to continue is past life as an assasin for survival

programme.title: Laggies
programme.desc: When her boyfriend proposes, Megan panics and takes an opportunity to escape the situation, by hiding in her new 16-year-old friend Annika's home, where she lives with her world-weary single dad

programme.title: About Time

programme.title: Miss You Already
programme.desc: The relationship between two life-long best friends is put to the test when one struggles to have a much longed-for baby and the other finds out she has breast cancer. How will they share that

programme.desc: To pursue and fail a blackmail plot by ruthless terrorist Castor Troy (Nicloas Cage), FBI Special Agent Sean Archer (John Travolta) agrees to undergo a surgical face implant to impersonate Troy physically, only to find that Troy is fighting him back using the same technique

programme.title: Broken City
programme.desc: In a city rife with injustice, ex-cop Billy Taggart seeks revenge after being double-crossed and framed by its most powerful figure: the mayor (Russell Crowe)

programme.title: How To Make An American Quilt
How to Train Your Dragon
programme.desc: Long ago a young Viking, Hiccup, wanted to fight dragons at his village that is always under raid. However, his macho father and village leader, Stoik the Vast, will not allow him to do so. Regardless, Hiccup ventures out into battle and downs a mysterious Night Fury dragon with his invention. However, he can not bring himself to kill it. Instead, Hiccup and the dragon begin a friendship that would change their lives as the observant boy learns that his people have misjudged the species

programme.title: Definitely, Maybe
programme.desc: A political consultant on the verge of divorce tries to explain his current situation and his past relationships to his 11 year old daughter

programme.title: The Other Woman
programme.desc: A woman (Cameron Diaz) is enraged when she discovers her boyfriend (Nikolaj Coster-Waldau) is married. She teams up with his wife (Leslie Mann) and another mistress of his (Kate Upton) to plot their revenge

programme.title: How to Be Single
programme.desc: Alice, Robin, Lucy, Meg, Tom and David live in New York, a city full of lonely wandering hearts. One purpose brings all of them together: the need to learn to sustain being single in a time when our definition of love is constantly changing

programme.title: Bad Moms
programme.desc: A Women lives near-perfect life: marriage is great, children precede her age, home of breathtaking view, but the progress of her career is frustrating, even though she works double effort, and highly committed, with all the frustrations she faces, she is about to reach the point of explosion, which get her forming an alliance with a group of other mothers to overcome all their routine lives

programme.title: Bridesmaids
programme.desc: When Annie, a simple Midwestern girl, is asked to be her best friend Lillian's maid of honor, she struggles to please the snobby, rich bridesmaids at every pre-wedding event

programme.title: Face/Off
programme.desc: To pursue and fail a blackmail plot by ruthless terrorist Castor Troy (Nicloas Cage), FBI Special Agent Sean Archer (John Travolta) agrees to undergo a surgical face implant to impersonate Troy physically, only to find that Troy is fighting him back using the same technique

programme.title: The Twilight Saga : Eclipse
programme.desc: This production is a vampire film based on the novel “Eclipse”. It is the third part of the “Twilight” series and was directed by David Slade. Edward Cullen (Robert Pattinson) is an immortal vampire that is in a relationship with a human called Bella Swan (Kristen Stewart). Bella wants Edward to bite her so that she would transform into a vampire but Edward believes that she is still too young for such a transformation and wants her to wait until they are married. Meanwhile Bella maintains her friendship with the werewolf Jacob Black (Taylor Launter). However, the relations between Vampires and Werewolves remain on the brink

programme.title: What to Expect When You're Expecting
Wall Street: Money Never Sleeps
programme.desc: This title is a drama that was directed by Oliver Stone. The film is a sequel to the hugely successful 1987 title “Wall Street” and is notable for being the first sequel Stone has made for any of his films. Actor Michael Douglas retains his Oscar-winning role as Gordon Gekko. The film also hosts the talents of Josh Brolin, Carey Mulligan among others while Charlie Sheen makes a brief cameo appearance reprising his role as Bud Fox. The film is set 23 years after the events depicted in the original “Wall Street”. Reformed Wall Street magnate Gordon Gekko (Michael Dougals) tries to help the financial industry avert the upcoming 2008 financial crisis. He also attempts to set things right with his estranged daughter

programme.title: Safe House
programme.desc: The ex-CIA agent Tobin Frost (actor Denzel Washington) turns to be an international criminal. He enters an American consulate and gets moved to a CIA safe house in Cape Town, South Africa. The "housekeeper" of this safe house is Matt Weston (actor Ryan Reynolds), a low-level agent who escapes with Frost when the house got attacked. Weston and Frost must stay out of the gunmen's sight until they can get to another safe house

programme.title: That Awkward Moment
programme.desc: Three best friends find themselves in that awkward moment in dating relationships when you ask yourself : Where will this end up ? Is this official or just a whim ? Will we live happily ever after or is it time to call it quits

programme.title: It's Complicated
programme.desc: This picture is a romantic comedy that brings together an ensemble cast. Jane (Meryl Streep) has finally managed to make things work out 10 years after her divorce from her ex-husband Jake (Alec Baldwin). However, this new stability is short lived. A short encounter with her now remarried ex-husband develops into an affair. Around the same time an architect that is remodeling Jane’s house, Adam (Steve Martin), also enters the picture as a potential romantic interest. This makes you wonder: Is it altogether much less complicated to live life as a single divorcee

programme.title: Hell Boy Ii: The Golden Army
District 9
programme.desc: This picture is a South African science fiction thriller that was directed by Neill Blomkamp. This unique film has garnered much critical acclaim and was nominated for four Academy Awards. Early in the 1980s an Alien ship came to a halt hovering over the South African city of Johannesburg. The aliens aboard the ship were relocated to District 9, a slum outside of Johannesburg. Wikus van de Merwe (Sharlto Copley) is a bureaucrat working for a large corporation. Wikus is tasked with overseeing the relocation of the extraterrestrials, derogatorily referred to as “Prawns” from District 9 to a newly constructed camp outside the city. Whilst overseeing the eviction of the aliens from their homes in District 9, Wikus comes into contact with a strange black chemical. Several hours after inhaling the chemical and to his horror, Wikus begins a physical transformation that makes him take the shape of the aliens. In the ensuing adventure the themes of xenophobia and apartheid are discussed in a very profound manner. Wikus learns that the “Prawns” as they are called are in fact misunderstood and that rather than being monsters they are actually gentle and loving creatures. Although the movie handles complicated themes it nonetheless has its fair share of action shots. All in all, it is a dramatic tour de force that teaches the viewer more than he would normally expect to learn from a sci-fi picture
